testCase.name: getCharacters should return the list of characters
getCharacterById should return the character with the given id
getCharacterById should throw an error if the character with the given id is not found
renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
does not render the character thumbnail image when not provided
renders "no character" when character is not provided
AboutPage sets the document title correctly
ContactPage sets the document title correctly
renders an empty list when no characters are provided
renders an empty list when characters is empty
renders the correct number of list items when characters are provided
